trans-unit.source: Provides support for reading and writing metadata to and from a bitmap image.
trans-unit.target: 提供对从位图图像中读取元数据以及将元数据写入位图图像的支持。

trans-unit.source: Metadata that is associated with an image is data that describes the image but is not necessary to display the image.
trans-unit.target: 与图像关联的元数据是描述图像，但不需要显示图像的数据。

trans-unit.source: Each supported bitmap image format handles metadata differently, but the facility for reading and writing metadata is the same.
trans-unit.target: 每种支持位图图像格式句柄元数据的方式不同，但用于读取和写入元数据的工具是相同的。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] supports the following image metadata schemas: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_exif](~/includes/tlasharptla-exif-md.md)], tEXt ([!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_png](~/includes/tla2sharptla-png-md.md)] Textual Data), [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ifd](~/includes/tlasharptla-ifd-md.md)], [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iptc](~/includes/tlasharptla-iptc-md.md)], and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xmp](~/includes/tlasharptla-xmp-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 支持以下图像元数据架构： [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_exif](~/includes/tlasharptla-exif-md.md)]，文本 ([!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_png](~/includes/tla2sharptla-png-md.md)]文本数据)， [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ifd](~/includes/tlasharptla-ifd-md.md)]， [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iptc](~/includes/tlasharptla-iptc-md.md)]，和[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xmp](~/includes/tlasharptla-xmp-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata> is exposed by a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> that is obtained by using a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapDecoder>, it is read-only by default and mutable operations will throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata>由公开<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame>获取通过使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapDecoder>、 它是默认情况下以只读的和可变操作将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: If it is exposed by a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> that wraps another <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource>, it is mutable on construction.
trans-unit.target: 如果通过公开<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame>包装另一个<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource>，它是可变构造。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata.SetQuery%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata.GetQuery%2A> methods can be used to construct and read metadata queries.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata.SetQuery%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata.GetQuery%2A>方法可以用于构造和读取元数据查询。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to write metadata to a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)] image by using the IFD and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_exif](~/includes/tla2sharptla-exif-md.md)] schemas.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何编写到的元数据[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)]映像通过使用 IFD 和[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_exif](~/includes/tla2sharptla-exif-md.md)]架构。

trans-unit.source: The format of the bitmap image, specified as "gif", "jpg", "png", or "tiff".
trans-unit.target: 位图图像的格式（指定为“gif”、“jpg”、“png”或“tiff”）。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata" /> for use with the specified image format.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata" /> 的新实例，以与指定图像格式一起使用。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to write metadata to a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)] image by using the IFD and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_exif](~/includes/tla2sharptla-exif-md.md)] schemas.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何编写到的元数据[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)]映像通过使用 IFD 和[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_exif](~/includes/tla2sharptla-exif-md.md)]架构。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="containerFormat" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="containerFormat" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that identifies the name of the application that was used to construct or alter an image file.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值标识用于构造或更改图像文件的应用程序的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the application that was used to construct or alter an image file.
trans-unit.target: 用于构造或更改图像文件的应用程序的名称。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to write metadata to a bitmap image by using friendly properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata> class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用友好属性的元数据写入位图图像<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that represents the author of an image.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置表示图像的作者的值。

trans-unit.source: The author of the image.
trans-unit.target: 图像的作者。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to write metadata to a bitmap image by using friendly properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata> class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用友好属性的元数据写入位图图像<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that identifies the camera manufacturer that is associated with an image.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值标识与图像关联的照相机制造商。

trans-unit.source: The camera manufacturer that is associated with an image.
trans-unit.target: 与图像关联的照相机制造商。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to write metadata to a bitmap image by using friendly properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata> class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用友好属性的元数据写入位图图像<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that identifies the camera model that was used to capture the image.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值标识用于捕获图像的相机型号。

trans-unit.source: The camera model that was used to capture the image.
trans-unit.target: 用于捕获图像的相机型号。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to write metadata to a bitmap image by using friendly properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata> class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用友好属性的元数据写入位图图像<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata>类。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 创建此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata" /> 的可修改克隆，从而深度复制此对象的值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property is <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property is <see langword="true." />
trans-unit.target: 即使源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性为 <see langword="true." />，所克隆对象的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性也为 <see langword="false" />

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定（但可能不再解析），但不复制动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata" /> to clone.
trans-unit.target: 要克隆的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata" />。

trans-unit.source: Makes this instance a deep copy of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata" />.
trans-unit.target: 使此实例成为指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata" /> 的深层副本。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A> method and should not be called directly from your code, except when calling the base implementation while overriding this method.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A>方法应不直接从代码中，除非调用时调用时重写此方法的基实现。

trans-unit.source: To create a modifiable copy of the current object, call <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A> instead of calling this method directly.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建当前对象的可修改副本，请调用<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A>而不是直接调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定（但可能不再解析），但不复制动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata" /> to clone.
trans-unit.target: 要克隆的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata" />。

trans-unit.source: Makes this instance a modifiable deep copy of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata" /> using current property values.
trans-unit.target: 使用当前的属性值使该实例成为指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata" /> 的可修改深层副本。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不复制资源引用、数据绑定和动画，而是复制其当前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A> method and should not be called directly from your code, except when calling the base implementation while overriding this method.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A>方法应不直接从代码中，除非调用时调用时重写此方法的基实现。

trans-unit.source: To create a modifiable copy of the current object, call <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A> instead of calling this method directly.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建当前对象的可修改副本，请调用<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A>而不是直接调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValueCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValueCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that represents a comment that is associated with the image file.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值表示与图像文件关联的注释。

trans-unit.source: A comment that is associated with the image file.
trans-unit.target: 与图像文件关联的注释。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to write metadata to a bitmap image by using friendly properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata> class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用友好属性的元数据写入位图图像<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata>类。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the string that is being queried in the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 标识要在当前 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata" /> 对象中查询的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a given query string exists within a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 确定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata" /> 对象内是否存在给定的查询字符串。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the query string is found within the metadata store; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在元数据存储中找到了查询字符串，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Metadata that is associated with an image is data that describes the image but that is not necessary for display of the image.
trans-unit.target: 与图像关联的元数据是描述图像，但这不是所需的映像显示的数据。

trans-unit.source: Each supported bitmap image format handles metadata differently, but the facility for reading and writing metadata is the same.
trans-unit.target: 每种支持位图图像格式句柄元数据的方式不同，但用于读取和写入元数据的工具是相同的。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] supports the following image metadata schemas: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_exif](~/includes/tlasharptla-exif-md.md)], tEXt ([!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_png](~/includes/tla2sharptla-png-md.md)] Textual Data), [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ifd](~/includes/tlasharptla-ifd-md.md)], [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iptc](~/includes/tlasharptla-iptc-md.md)], and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xmp](~/includes/tlasharptla-xmp-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 支持以下图像元数据架构： [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_exif](~/includes/tlasharptla-exif-md.md)]，文本 ([!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_png](~/includes/tla2sharptla-png-md.md)]文本数据)， [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ifd](~/includes/tlasharptla-ifd-md.md)]， [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iptc](~/includes/tlasharptla-iptc-md.md)]，和[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xmp](~/includes/tlasharptla-xmp-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="query" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="query" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates copyright information that is associated with the image file.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示与图像文件关联的版权信息。

trans-unit.source: The copyright information that is associated with the image file.
trans-unit.target: 与图像文件关联的版权信息。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to write metadata to a bitmap image by using friendly properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata> class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用友好属性的元数据写入位图图像<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata>类。

trans-unit.source: An Implementation of <see cref="M:System.Windows.Freezable.CreateInstance" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Windows.Freezable.CreateInstance" /> 的实现。

trans-unit.source: The new instance.
trans-unit.target: 新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates the date that the image was taken.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个指示图像捕获日期的值。

trans-unit.source: The date that the image was taken.
trans-unit.target: 图像的捕获日期。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to write metadata to a bitmap image by using friendly properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata> class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用友好属性的元数据写入位图图像<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that identifies the format of the image.
trans-unit.target: 获取标识图像格式的值。

trans-unit.source: The format of the bitmap image.
trans-unit.target: 位图图像的格式。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to read various properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata> object and send their values to a <xref:System.Windows.MessageBox> as strings.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何读取各种属性<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata>对象，并将其值为发送<xref:System.Windows.MessageBox>作为字符串。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata" /> object to clone and freeze.
trans-unit.target: 要克隆和冻结的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Makes this instance a clone of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 使该实例成为指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata" /> 对象的复本。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定（但可能不再解析），但不复制动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: Note that if these properties contain resource references or data bindings, <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A> will fail when trying to freeze the object and will throw an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果这些属性包含资源引用或数据绑定<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A>将失败时尝试冻结该对象，并将引发<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A> method and should not be called directly from your code, except when calling the base implementation while overriding this method.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A>方法应不直接从代码中，除非调用时调用时重写此方法的基实现。

trans-unit.source: To create a frozen copy of the current object, call <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A> instead of calling this method directly.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建当前对象的冻结的副本，请调用<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A>而不是直接调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozenCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozenCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata" /> to copy and freeze.
trans-unit.target: 要复制和冻结的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata" />。

trans-unit.source: Makes this instance a frozen clone of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata" />.
trans-unit.target: 使该实例成为指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata" /> 的冻结复本。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不复制资源引用、数据绑定和动画，而是复制其当前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetCurrentValueAsFrozen%2A> method and should not be called directly from your code, except when calling the base implementation while overriding this method.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetCurrentValueAsFrozen%2A>方法应不直接从代码中，除非调用时调用时重写此方法的基实现。

trans-unit.source: To create a frozen copy of the current object, call <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetCurrentValueAsFrozen%2A> instead of calling this method directly.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建当前对象的冻结的副本，请调用<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetCurrentValueAsFrozen%2A>而不是直接调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetCurrentValueAsFrozenCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetCurrentValueAsFrozenCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the string that is being queried in the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 标识要在当前 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata" /> 对象中查询的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Provides access to a metadata query reader that can extract metadata from a bitmap image file.
trans-unit.target: 提供对元数据查询读取器的访问，该读取器可从位图图像文件中提取元数据。

trans-unit.source: The metadata at the specified query location.
trans-unit.target: 位于指定查询位置的元数据。

trans-unit.source: Metadata that is associated with an image is data that describes the image but that is not necessary for display of the image.
trans-unit.target: 与图像关联的元数据是描述图像，但这不是所需的映像显示的数据。

trans-unit.source: Each supported bitmap image format handles metadata differently, but the facility for reading and writing metadata is the same.
trans-unit.target: 每种支持位图图像格式句柄元数据的方式不同，但用于读取和写入元数据的工具是相同的。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] supports the following image metadata schemas: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_exif](~/includes/tlasharptla-exif-md.md)], tEXt ([!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_png](~/includes/tla2sharptla-png-md.md)] Textual Data), [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ifd](~/includes/tlasharptla-ifd-md.md)], [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iptc](~/includes/tlasharptla-iptc-md.md)], and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xmp](~/includes/tlasharptla-xmp-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 支持以下图像元数据架构： [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_exif](~/includes/tlasharptla-exif-md.md)]，文本 ([!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_png](~/includes/tla2sharptla-png-md.md)]文本数据)， [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ifd](~/includes/tlasharptla-ifd-md.md)]， [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iptc](~/includes/tlasharptla-iptc-md.md)]，和[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xmp](~/includes/tlasharptla-xmp-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata.SetQuery%2A> method to write metadata to a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)] file.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata.SetQuery%2A>方法写入到的元数据[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)]文件。

trans-unit.source: After the metadata is written, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata.GetQuery%2A> method is used to read that data and emit it as a text string.
trans-unit.target: 编写元数据后，<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata.GetQuery%2A>方法用于读取该数据并发出文本字符串形式。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="query" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="query" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that determines whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata" /> object is a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值确定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata" /> 对象是否为固定大小。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata" /> is a fixed size; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata" /> 为固定大小，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to read various properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata> object and send their values to a <xref:System.Windows.MessageBox> as strings.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何读取各种属性<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata>对象，并将其值为发送<xref:System.Windows.MessageBox>作为字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the metadata that is associated with an image is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示与图像关联的元数据是否为只读。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the metadata is read-only; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果元数据为只读，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to read various properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata> object and send their values to a <xref:System.Windows.MessageBox> as strings.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何读取各种属性<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata>对象，并将其值为发送<xref:System.Windows.MessageBox>作为字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a collection of keywords that describe the bitmap image.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置描述位图图像的关键字的集合。

trans-unit.source: A read-only collection of strings.
trans-unit.target: 字符串的只读集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that identifies the base location of the metadata that is associated with an image.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值标识与图像关联的元数据的基位置。

trans-unit.source: The base location of the image metadata.
trans-unit.target: 图像元数据的基位置。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to read various properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata> object and send their values to a <xref:System.Windows.MessageBox> as strings.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何读取各种属性<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata>对象，并将其值为发送<xref:System.Windows.MessageBox>作为字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that identifies the image rating.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个标识图像分级的值。

trans-unit.source: The rating value between 0 and 5.
trans-unit.target: 介于 0 和 5 之间的分级值。

trans-unit.source: The metadata query to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要删除的元数据查询。

trans-unit.source: Removes a metadata query from an instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata" />.
trans-unit.target: 从 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata" /> 的实例中删除元数据查询。

trans-unit.source: Metadata that is associated with an image is data that describes the image but that is not necessary for display of the image.
trans-unit.target: 与图像关联的元数据是描述图像，但这不是所需的映像显示的数据。

trans-unit.source: Each supported bitmap image format handles metadata differently, but the facility for reading and writing metadata is the same.
trans-unit.target: 每种支持位图图像格式句柄元数据的方式不同，但用于读取和写入元数据的工具是相同的。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] supports the following image metadata schemas: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_exif](~/includes/tlasharptla-exif-md.md)], tEXt ([!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_png](~/includes/tla2sharptla-png-md.md)] Textual Data), [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ifd](~/includes/tlasharptla-ifd-md.md)], [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iptc](~/includes/tlasharptla-iptc-md.md)], and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xmp](~/includes/tlasharptla-xmp-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 支持以下图像元数据架构： [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_exif](~/includes/tlasharptla-exif-md.md)]，文本 ([!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_png](~/includes/tla2sharptla-png-md.md)]文本数据)， [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ifd](~/includes/tlasharptla-ifd-md.md)]， [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iptc](~/includes/tlasharptla-iptc-md.md)]，和[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xmp](~/includes/tlasharptla-xmp-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="query" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="query" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when image metadata is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 当图像元数据为只读时发生。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the location of the metadata to be written.
trans-unit.target: 标识要写入的元数据的位置。

trans-unit.source: The value of the metadata to be written.
trans-unit.target: 要写入的元数据的值。

trans-unit.source: Provides access to a metadata query writer that can write metadata to a bitmap image file.
trans-unit.target: 提供对元数据查询编写器的访问，该编写器可将元数据写入位图图像文件。

trans-unit.source: Metadata that is associated with an image is data that describes the image but that is not necessary for display of the image.
trans-unit.target: 与图像关联的元数据是描述图像，但这不是所需的映像显示的数据。

trans-unit.source: Each supported bitmap image format handles metadata differently, but the facility for reading and writing metadata is the same.
trans-unit.target: 每种支持位图图像格式句柄元数据的方式不同，但用于读取和写入元数据的工具是相同的。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] supports the following image metadata schemas: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_exif](~/includes/tlasharptla-exif-md.md)], tEXt ([!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_png](~/includes/tla2sharptla-png-md.md)] Textual Data), [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ifd](~/includes/tlasharptla-ifd-md.md)], [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iptc](~/includes/tlasharptla-iptc-md.md)], and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xmp](~/includes/tlasharptla-xmp-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 支持以下图像元数据架构： [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_exif](~/includes/tlasharptla-exif-md.md)]，文本 ([!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_png](~/includes/tla2sharptla-png-md.md)]文本数据)， [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ifd](~/includes/tlasharptla-ifd-md.md)]， [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iptc](~/includes/tlasharptla-iptc-md.md)]，和[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xmp](~/includes/tlasharptla-xmp-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata.SetQuery%2A> method to write metadata to a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)] file.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata.SetQuery%2A>方法写入到的元数据[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)]文件。

trans-unit.source: After the metadata is written, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata.GetQuery%2A> method is used to read that data and emit it as a text string.
trans-unit.target: 编写元数据后，<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata.GetQuery%2A>方法用于读取该数据并发出文本字符串形式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates the subject matter of the bitmap image.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值表示位图的主题。

trans-unit.source: The subject of the bitmap image.
trans-unit.target: 位图的主题。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to write metadata to a bitmap image by using friendly properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata> class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用友好属性的元数据写入位图图像<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata>类。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1.GetEnumerator" />.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅 <see cref="M:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1.GetEnumerator" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerator`1" /> object that can be used to iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: 一个可用于循环访问集合的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerator`1" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator" />.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅 <see cref="M:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> object that can be used to iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: 一个可用于循环访问集合的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that identifies the title of an image file.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值标识图像文件的标题。

trans-unit.source: The title of an image file.
trans-unit.target: 图像文件的标题。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to write metadata to a bitmap image by using friendly properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata> class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用友好属性的元数据写入位图图像<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata>类。
